introduction: Mary is 11 years old and has an irrepressible passion for cooking: she wants to become a great chef. Her grandmother Emer, with whom she has a very special relationship, encourages her to make her dream come true. But every path of her has her obstacles, even unpredictable ones, and facing them can become an adventure. Thus Mary begins a journey that overcomes the barriers of time, where four generations of women will be able to confront each other and get to know each other deeply. A delicate story of growing up, full of irony.
